sys_ui_message.key: Engage donors online and fuel your mission year-round. Quickly launch giving campaigns that drive impact and convert online donations.
sys_ui_message.message: Engagez les donateurs en ligne et alimentez votre mission toute l'année. Lancez rapidement des campagnes de collecte de fonds qui génèrent un impact et convertissent les dons en ligne.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Engage donors online and fuel your mission year-round. Quickly launch giving campaigns that drive impact and convert online donations.
